ModMetaData.name: RimFantasy - Crystallic Lighting
ModMetaData.author: Sierra
ModMetaData.description:
[h1]Mod Version: v1.2[/h1]
This mod adds a number of magical furniture that radiates light into their surroundings.
These furniture are safe to place under the rain and are quite beautiful to look at. Be careful though, the energies within the crystals are barely contained and excessive damage will produce a small explosion.
[b]Features:[/b] [list] [*]2 Lamps (General lighting) [*]3 Wall Lamps (Plant growing/General lighting) [*]3 Pedestals (Plant growing/General lighting) [*]1 Research [/list] [i]Darklight furnitures requires [b]Ideology [Official DLC][/b].[/i]
[b]Recommended Mods:[/b] [list] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2630669656]RimFantasy - Gemstones[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2630670287]RimFantasy - Temperature Regulation[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2630670287]RimFantasy - Arcane Batons[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2651522590]RimFantasy - Arcane Weapons[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1916352291]RimTraits - Medieval Talent[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2206957172]RimTraits - General Traits[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2244594116]RimTraits - Vanilla Trait Colors[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2595980371]Milkshakes - Digital Deluxe Edition[/url] [/list]
[b]Compatibility:[/b] [list] [*]Save Game Compatible [*]Will not play nice with other gemstone mods without a patch. [/list] [i]Dr Zhivago's [b]DocUniversalResources[/b] (DUR) will address resource overlaps for mod compatibility when it is finished.[/i]
[b]Balance:[/b] Gems are intentionally sparse and not easy to obtain through natural means, but they can also be purchased from traders or obtained from salvaging certain objects.
Balance feedbacks are welcomed, please provide context when doing so.
